forum.name: T2D2 Discussion: Share About Your Assessments’ Stakeholders
forum.intro:
Discussion: Responses to Thoughts on an Assessment of Common Core Standards

Based on your reading, please post your responses to the following questions:

  • Who are the people who have a vested interest in your program (the stakeholders)? 
  • What type of information do they request and how do you collect this information for them? 
  • Do you find that collecting program information is helpful for yourself and your students? If so, how?  If not, why not?

After you post, please take time to review others posted responses and post at least one reply in response.

Once You Have Completed Your Post:

Click on the Intro-Assessment-ABE link at the top (or at left under "my Courses") to return to the Course Outline and access the next course activity.
